titles.title: A bill to designate the Veterans' Administration Medical Center in Buffalo, New York, as the "Major Robert J. DiTommaso Veterans' Administration Medical Center".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/6/1987--Introduced. Designates the Veterans Administration Medical Center in Buffalo, New York, as the Major Robert J. DiTommaso Veterans' Administration Medical Center.
